function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risk of surface transmission due to shared equipment and facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete temperature testing may allow asymptomatic carriers to enter the facility, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of full body sterilizers and reliance only on hand sanitizers can result in inadequate disinfection of individuals entering the facility.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous cleaning and sterilization practices may not be effective in preventing the spread of contagious diseases if not done properly or if the cleaning products used are not effective against the specific pathogen.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Removal of shared and reusable resources may reduce the risk of surface contamination, but if not replaced with adequate alternatives, it may lead to dissatisfaction among building occupants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited occupancy measures may not be effectively enforced without proper control measures or technologies, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of physical interactions and disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of towels hangers and lockers increases the risk of contagious disease transmission among members.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear markings and separation of warm-up areas and running lanes increases the potential for members to interact closely, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient cleaning and sterilization of equipment and machines increases the risk of disease transmission among gym members.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Members not pre-booking on the digital calendar","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Masks being taken off during group sessions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of interactions between members allowed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased occupancy during nighttime operation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial arrangement for equipment and crowded queuing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for virtual training classes and reduced interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment and cleaning tools for janitors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in cleaning and operation processes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate post-pandemic measures for facility prevention and preparedness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replacement of air duct types from aluminum to fabric could lead to the spread of contaminants if not managed properly.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of filters in diffusers increases the risk of spreading contaminants through the supplied air.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection measures can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrequent cleaning of air diffusers and lack of complete sterilization sessions increase the risk of indoor contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial configuration increases the risk of disease transmission during intensive exercise sessions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of precautionary measures in health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of health club facility risks in relation to pandemic propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of precautionary measures across modular health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate precautionary measures in sports facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantifiable measures in the assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impacts on public and private sports organizations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of detailed poe studies for health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of schematics instead of accurate drawings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited descriptive material based on quantitative methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global lack of access to vaccines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in cancer diagnoses due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missed regular vaccinations for other infectious diseases during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial minorities at higher risk of infection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socioeconomically deprived populations vulnerable to nphis targeting covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on trust in nphi effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of nphis is challenging to evaluate due to different measures and study types used","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Single studies conducted in specific communities may not provide conclusive evidence of nphi effectiveness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias in comparing outcomes of communities with and without nphis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies using mathematical modelling for simulations and predictions may present a risk of bias in the review","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of studies targeting specific populations may lead to a limited understanding of the effects of nphis on those populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to receive additional information from corresponding authors may result in incomplete data for the meta-analysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative data extraction involving multiple investigators may lead to variations in data interpretation and extraction.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disagreements during the screening and review process may lead to delays in study completion and potential bias in study inclusion.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of study methodology using subjective tools may introduce bias and affect the validity of the findings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting meta-analyses without proper consideration of study quality and bias may lead to inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of publication bias may lead to overestimation or underestimation of treatment effects.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
